quality work on time.', 'An effective communicator with strong interpersonal skills.', 'Willing to learn new skills and adaptable to fluctuating workloads and deadlines.', 'Create software and data pipelines that enable the ingestion, transformation and transfer of large quantities of structured and unstructured clinical data from various databases and filesystems sources, that are destined for the development of computation pathology applications and algorithms.', 'Build database logic to automatically fetch and store data in various forms.', 'Be responsible for server, application, and database development and the building and testing of high-performance, complex systems.', 'Produce required functional, technical, and user documentation (e.g., business requirements, functional and technical specifications, system architecture, data flows, end-users training requirements) on assigned projects.', 'Work and collaborate with scientists, engineers, IT operations and medical doctors to build tools manipulating data in order to build a new generation of artificial intelligence applications for cancer detection and treatment.', 'Learn the Pathology Department’s laboratory and diagnostic procedures as they pertain to the generation and flow of data in Digital and Computational Pathology.', 'Provide consultation and guidance to scientists, engineers, as well as other bioinformatics engineers and medical doctors, at the Center and partnering institutions.', 'Maintain and improve professional growth and development through participation in scientific and technical discussions, workshops, and seminars to keep current in the development of industry-grade software.', 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Biomedical Engineering or related field', '4+ years of industry experience as a Data Engineer', 'Extensive experience in Python programming, or related language.', 'Extensive experience in the development of SQL database schema and job_title: Global Trade Compliance Investigator and Auditor
job_text: ['Assist business segments with investigations of compliance incident reports and other compliance matters. * Help to properly scope investigations and document the results. * Review, coordinate and track Department of Commerce, Department of State, and Census Bureau voluntary disclosures * Assist with scheduling and data collection in preparation for internal trade compliance assessments, audits, etc. * Monitor trade compliance through self-assessments, compliance assistance visits (CAVs), and audits * Track and follow-up on corrective actions related to voluntary disclosures, CAVs, self-assessments, audits, etc.', 'Track metrics and create reports pertaining to various elements of the export/import process, and report on trends, areas of concern and improvement opportunities Qualifications: * Bachelor"s degree in relevant field of study or equivalent practical work experience required * Ability to apply U.S. Government regulatory requirements in complex scenarios * Specialized knowledge of U.S. Government trade regulations * Proficiency in Microsoft Office products (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook) and SharePoint If you are interested in this Global Trade Compliance Investigator and Auditor job in Arlington, VA please apply via the \'apply now\' link provided. Belcan is a global supplier of engineering, technical recruiting, and IT services to customers in the aerospace, industrial, and government sectors.']

job_title: SDET/QA Automation Engineer (Selenium, SQL, Data Analytics)
job_text: ['5 years of SDET or SEIT', 'SQL experience (advanced)', 'Data Analytics experience', 'Selenium experience', 'Experience developing testing frameworks', 'Healthcare industry experience preferred (not required)', 'Monday to Friday']

['Help lead the design of an automated claims data ingestion process that accepts claims data from hundreds of healthcare clients in varying formats and organizes into a consistent data model.', 'Drive the design and evolution of a logical data model derived from claims data that summarizes discrete encounters and each encounter’s details, including care setting, diagnoses, procedures, and attributed costs.', 'Acquire and organize raw healthcare data in CSV, TXT, JSON and other formats from our clients using AWS S3 buckets in a data lake organizational model.', 'Create automated ETL processes to transform raw claims data in CSV, TXT, JSON and other raw data formats into Apache Parquet representation of a consistent data model supporting data science, data analytics, reporting and data visualization functions.', 'Drive standardization in client data requests to efficiently gather additional member and patient data from clients to support powerful analytics.', 'Maintain an exceptional level of quality, efficiency, and effectiveness in the deliverables of each product sprint.', 'Bachelor’s degree in related field or equivalent experience; advanced degree preferred.', 'Expert-level understanding of healthcare claims file formats and the domain concepts behind each field.', 'Expert-level understanding of how to identify discrete healthcare encounters – ED visits, Inpatient stays, PCP visits, and Outpatient procedures – along with final paid amounts from raw claims formats.', '5+ years of direct experience working directly with electronic healthcare data claims formats to load and organize claims data in multiple formats, including 837/835, UB, and HCFA.', 'Proven experience extracting, transforming, and loading raw claims format data into higher level logical data model constructs.', '3+ years of direct experience in creating and implementing complex SQL and ETL scripts and processes, especially in a secure AWS environment.', 'Programming skills in Python is a plus.', 'All candidates approved for handling protected health information (PHI) must pass a background screening.', 'You’ll join a team of passionate people working collaboratively to build an amazing company that will have a real impact on the world.', 'You’ll be empowered to innovate and apply your intellectual curiosity to interesting technical and business challenges.', 'You’ll work to use groundbreaking technology and approaches to disrupt old ways of looking at health care.']

['A Bachelors or Masters degree in STEM field such as Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics', '5-7+ years of relevant Quality Engineering automation experience (ie, UI, system, integration, API, performance/load, database, security, end to end)', '3+ years of writing test scripts from scratch with the ability to extend test frameworks, framework creation is a plus (ie, Selenium WebDriver, Postman, JMeter, Junit/NUnit, PyTest, Scala Test, Spark)', '3+ years of experience with Object Oriented Programming languages - Java and Python or Scala', 'Strong SQL skills and experience working on a big data platform', 'Experience working in a Linux/Unix environment', 'Continuous integration and delivery mindset, Jenkins or similar experience a plus, Git or similar a plus', 'Soft skills: self-motivated, flexible and adaptable, ability to multi-task, agile mindset', 'Collaborating with business owners, subject matter experts, and go to market teams to develop testing strategies and approaches to support multiple distributed agile teams', 'Participating in activities focused around the agile software development cycle', 'Designing, developing and supporting test automation', 'Contributing and collaborating on test frameworks, environments, tool selection and infrastructure', 'Identifying data requirements and generating and maintaining test data', 'Reporting testing progress and quality status to stakeholders, participating in test planning and bug triages', 'Automation, Python, Agile', 'Automated testing Skills', 'Code like a developer/ Devops exp or CI/CD', 'Good Communication is required', 'Python/ Cucumber/ Python/ java / BDD Python version of cucumber', 'Temporarily due to COVID-19']
